name: Jetpack: Episode Three
description:
JETPACK 3
The new episode of the jetpack 2019 series, You will have to embark on the jet adventure and enter a new dungeon to get all the emeralds in order to open the doors that lead to the next level. Understand that there will be new enemies, new traps and new challenges, as well as a new system of dynamic music and elements that drive you to achieve your goals.

Controls:
Keyboard arrows: Movement
X: Jetpack
Esc: Suicide / Exit
Alt+Enter: Alternate full/window screen
F5: LOAD GAME, F6: SAVE GAME, F9: Set Small Res (800x450)
